mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( USER_ID, LOCATION_ID, IMAGE_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, IS_NEGOTIABLE, IS_DIRECTTRADE, CREATEDATE, MODIFYDATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{locationId}, #{imageId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{isNegotiable}, #{isOfflineTrade}, #{createdDate}, #{modifyDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT POST.*, LOCATION.CITY_COUNTRY_TOWN as location FROM POST INNER JOIN LOCATION ON POST.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID
SELECT POST.*, LOCATION.CITY_COUNTRY_TOWN as location FROM POST INNER JOIN LOCATION ON POST.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTitle},'%')
SELECT POST.*, LOCATION.CITY_COUNTRY_TOWN as location FROM POST INNER JOIN LOCATION ON POST.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID WHERE CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%')
SELECT POST.*, LOCATION.CITY_COUNTRY_TOWN as location FROM POST INNER JOIN LOCATION ON POST.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID WHERE POST.LOCATION_ID = #{locationId}
SELECT POST.*, LOCATION.CITY_COUNTRY_TOWN as location FROM POST INNER JOIN LOCATION ON POST.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET LOCATION_ID = #{locationId}, IMAGE_ID = #{imageId}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, PRICE = #{price}, IS_NEGOTIABLE = #{isNegotiable}, IS_DIRECTTRADE = #{isOfflineTrade} WHERE POST_ID = #{id}
